general.title: Title
general.name: Name
general.communities: Software Craftsmanship Communities in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
about_us_text: Softwerkskammer founded itself in 2011 in order to simplify the exchange of experiences among people interested in Software Craftsmanship.
The local communities use it to organise their meetings and other events like Code Retreats or Open Spaces,
or they simply share ideas or discuss interesting things on their mailing list.
p Look at the Activities menu to find out what we're up to over the next few weeks.
general.gdcr_text: Here you find almost all german-speaking activities. You can find a full overview at
general.what_does_not_work: What does not work the way it should?
goodbye_text: p Take care - see you soon!
p.text-right Or maybe you want to return?

error.click_links: I'd suggest you click on one of the links in the header.

activities.which_addon_to_collect: The following additional information will be queried upon registration. Each field marked with * is mandatory.

tooltip.title: Short and concise for overviews
tooltip.startdate: End date and time will be shifted automatically (the duration remains the same)

tooltip.address_suffix: Used for links within this site

tooltip.deregistration: Here you can allow or block de-registration
tooltip.waitinglist: Should the resource have a waiting list?

payment.title: Payment
payment.how_to_pay: Choose how you'd like to pay.
payment.how_to_pay_detail: The event requires a deposit upon registration. Please decide how you'd like to pay. You can either send the money via bank transfer (to a German account) or you can pay via credit card (an additional handling fee will be charged).

authentication.authentication_text: You can authenticate via one of the methods given below. Subsequently, we ask you to provide some personal data.
authentication.alternative_url: (optional) Enter the URL of an alternative OpenID provider
error_text: p Unfortunately, something went wrong during authentication.
p If the error occurs repeatedly, please
li How did you access the login page?
li Which authentication did you choose?
li If you entered a URL manually, which was it?
required_text: h3 You need to be logged-in to access this page!
p You wanted to access a protected page inside the members section. To do that you need to authenticate yourself.
p If this is an application error, we apologize and would love to get
p The Agora-Team is begging your pardon.

tooltip.name: The e-mail address "@softwerkskammer.org" where the group can be reached.
tooltip.title: Name of the group used in the website, also realname for e-mails sent by the group
tooltip.email_prefix: surrounded by [], it prefixes the subject of e-mails sent via the group
tooltip.map_label: Label that is displayed in the map

mailsender.to_participants: only to the activity's participants (not to groups)
mailsender.subject: Subject
mailsender.why-resign: Why do you want to resign
mailsender.notes-resign: Please let us know what you think about this site
resign_info: p We are sorry that you want to leave.
p We are respecting this and will remove your account as soon as possible. We would be glad if you answered the following questions.
p Account removal is a manual process and sending this form will triger an email to us administators.

members.reference: How I got to know about Softwerkskammer

rename_info: p Renaming the page will not adapt links to the page.
p Please search for the old page name and change found links accordingly.
